assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed in studies involving human participants were in accordance with the ethical standards of the Ethics Committee of Ankara University (012413) and the Institutional Review Board at the University of Miami (20081138) and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards. This article does not contain any studies with animals performed by any of the authors.
